title: Railroad Wash (Gila River tributary)
text: Railroad Wash is a seasonal <a href="stream">stream</a> or <a href="Arroyo%20%28creek%29">wash</a> and a <a href="tributary">tributary</a> of the <a href="Gila%20River">Gila River</a>. Its mouth is at its confluence with the Gila River, at an elevation of 3,839 feet / 1,170 meters. Its source is located at an elevation of 4,237 feet on the west side of the <a href="Summit%20Hills%20%28New%20Mexico%29">Summit Hills</a>, in <a href="Hidalgo%20County%2C%20New%20Mexico">Hidalgo County, New Mexico</a>, at .
